wissim.controller.filters.gui.AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter

    Package Description
    wissim.controller.filters.gui  

    • Uses of AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter in wissim.controller.filters.gui

      Fields in wissim.controller.filters.gui declared as AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter[] AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.filters
      Each of the defined .
      Elsewhere, it is kept as a Set, but here, it is needed to associate a column to each specific filter, so an array is chosen
      The first N filters correspond to the N filters of each editor, sorted by column order.
      Note that any of the first N filters could be null, if there is no column on that position (column removed from model)
      Methods in wissim.controller.filters.gui that return AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter

      Returns the filter with the given IFilter.

      Handles a change on a filter, updating the RowInfo array.
